title: Translation of "radiate" into Spanish
description: Check 'radiate' translations into Spanish. Look through examples of radiate translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar.
text:
Translation of "radiate" into Spanish
irradiar, radiar, brillar are the top translations of "radiate" into Spanish. Sample translated sentence: You are a magical being who radiates with light. ↔ Usted es un ser mágico que irradia luz.
To extend, send or spread out from a center like radii. [..]
[+ Add translation Add](/add-translation?l1=en&l2=es&phrase.l1Text=radiate)radiate
English-Spanish dictionary
-
irradiarverb
to emit rays or waves
You are a magical being who radiates with light.
Usted es un ser mágico que irradia luz.
-
radiarverb
A vehicle shall be tested for radiated emissions and for immunity to radiated disturbances.
Los vehículos se someterán a ensayo respecto a las radiaciones y a la inmunidad a las perturbaciones radiadas.
-
brillar
Mitry as an artist to radiation from the mountain where I built our house.
Mi fama de artista brillará por todo el mundo. desde la colina donde construiré nuestra casa.
-
